content: c4b p4 c4b p4 sm knit to end of round round 5 k8 12 16 sm p4 k4 p4 k4 p4 sm knit to end of round round 6 k8 12 16 sm p2 t4b t4f twice p2 sm knit to end of round round 7 k8 12 16 sm p2 k2 p4 k4 p4 k2 p2 sm knit to end of round round 8 k8 12 16 sm p2 k2 p4 c4b p4 k2 p2 sm knit to end of round round 9 k8 12 16 sm p2 k2 p4 k4 p4 k2 p2 sm knit to end of round round 10 k8 12 16 sm p2 k2 p4 k4 p4 k2 p2 sm knit to end of round round 11 k8 12 16 sm p2 k2 p4 k4 p4 k2 p2 sm knit to end of round round 12 k8 12 16 sm p2 k2 p4 c4b p4 k2 p2 sm knit to end of round round 13 k8 12 16 sm p2 k2 p4 k4 p4 k2 p2 sm knit to end of round round 14 k8 12 16 sm p2 k2 p4 k4 p4 k2 p2 sm knit to end of round round 15 k8 12 16 sm p2 k2 p4 k4 p4 k2 p2 sm knit to end of round round 16 k8 12 16 sm p2 k2 p4 c4b p4 k2 p2 sm knit to end of round round 17 k8 12 16 sm p2 k2 p4 k4 p4 k2 p2 sm knit to end of round round 18 k8 12 16 sm p2 t4f t4b twice p2 sm knit to end of round round 19 k8 12 16 sm p4 k4 p4 k4 p4 sm knit to end of round round 20 k8 12 16 sm p4 c4b p4 c4b p4 sm knit to end of round repeat this 20 round pattern another 2 times 3 times in all as in the sample or until desired length then for optimal comfort in the front of the foot repeat rounds 1 and 2 before moving to the heel flap section #disturbanceintheforcesocks page 6 of 12 marie-elyse dugal designs heel flap eye of partridge beginning on ws with the last 28 32 36 stitches work heel flap back and forth as follows while keeping instep stitches - those that will become the top of the foot - on hold until it is time for the gusset row 1 sl1 wyf purl to end turn row 2 *sl1 k1 *repeat from * to end turn row 3 sl1 wyf purl to end turn row 4 sl1 *sl1 k1 repeat from * to last stitch k1 turn repeat these 4 row 6 7 8 more times for a total of 28 32 36 row alternate heel flap row 1 sl1 wyf purl to end turn row 2 *sl1 k1 repeat from * to end turn repeat these 2 row 13 15 17 more times 14 16 18 times each for a total of 28 32 36 row
